name: The Talent Enterprise
description: Simply stated, The Talent Enterprise’s proprietary approach towards the science of Behaviourmetry® is characterised by the measurement of behaviour using a variety of proprietary ‘behavioural markers’ developed by our team of organisational psychologists, data scientists and technology experts. Together, these measures are known as Behaviourmetrics® and include aspects such as contemporary psychometrics, gamified assessments, multi-rater surveys, expert ratings as well as artificial intelligence derived indicators, together, providing one of the most in-depth, comprehensive and holistic analysis of an individual’s behaviour.
features: Powers all your talent assessment needs on a unified platform
Provides a seamless and immersive end user experience to your candidates, employees and leaders
Allows easy implementation with minimal setup requirements, as it's cloud-based

ShortDescription: The Talent Enterprise helps leading organisations make critical people decisions through the science of behaviourmetrics®, blending contemporary psychometric tools and assessment solutions with the latest advances in artificial intelligence and data science.

Highlights.name: Career Guidance
Highlights.description: The Career Thriving Index® identifies an individual’s innate strengths and recommends careers where they can thrive. Based on a ‘world of employment’ map comprising of over +1000 Roles across 24 Career Clusters and 95 Career Sub-Tracks, It provides feedback on critical strengths that are required to thrive in their top 5 sectors, providing a clear roadmap for career planning and future development.

Highlights.name: Talent Acquisition
Highlights.description: Assess all levels and roles from graduate to C-suite recruitment, focussing on candidate experience and your talent brand.

Highlights.name: High Potential
Highlights.description: Identify your future leaders through our proprietary assessment methodology evaluating future leadership potential and your overall talent bench-strength.  LEARN MORE Succession Planning Manage talent risks and prepare your organization for the future by evaluating the readiness of your managers and leaders to be part of your leadership pipeline.

enhanced_description: The Talent Enterprise specializes in Behaviourmetry®, a proprietary scientific approach to measure human behavior. It leverages a variety of proprietary 'behavioural markers' developed by organizational psychologists, data scientists, and technology experts. These measures, known as Behaviourmetrics®, encompass contemporary psychometrics, gamified assessments, multi-rater surveys, expert ratings, and artificial intelligence-derived indicators. This provides an in-depth, comprehensive, and holistic analysis of an individual's behavior, helping leading organizations make critical people decisions. The platform is cloud-based and designed to power all talent assessment needs on a unified platform, offering a seamless and immersive experience for candidates, employees, and leaders.
key_use_cases: Identifying innate strengths and recommending career paths through the Career Thriving Index®
Assessing candidates for recruitment across all levels, from graduate to C-suite
Identifying and developing high-potential employees for future leadership roles
Strategic succession planning and talent risk management
Informing critical people decisions within organizations
